channel.title: Transfer Learning on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Transfer Learning on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Bayesian-guided Label Mapping for Visual Reprogramming
item.description: Bayesian-guided Label Mapping (BLM) enhances visual reprogramming!

item.title: Geodesic Optimization for Predictive Shift Adaptation on EEG data
item.description: GOPSA: a novel geodesic optimization method significantly improves cross-site age prediction from EEG data by jointly handling shifts in data and predictive variables.

item.title: Monte Carlo Tree Search based Space Transfer for Black Box Optimization
item.description: MCTS-transfer: Iteratively refining Bayesian optimization via Monte Carlo tree search for efficient black-box optimization using transfer learning.

item.title: Schrodinger Bridge Flow for Unpaired Data Translation
item.description: Accelerate unpaired data translation with Schrödinger Bridge Flow, a novel algorithm solving optimal transport problems efficiently without repeatedly training models!
